Blog.post: 2day i arrived in schx at 6.40+.. so early sia... haiz.. den assembly, sec 3e and 3n haf to stay back.. mr rafi said "teachers, look out for their hand movements, in case they are passin handphones" wat the fuck! i tot got spotcheck sia... but then its juz a briefing... i worry 4 nothing.. then wen we in class, my classmates said got spotcheck.. im so damn worried.. luckily got the makcik stall 6.. i luv her man! she kept the handphone 4 me, athirah and nadia.. but then............. NO SPOTCHECK! i saw I.S juz now... wah long tyme never see him sia... but he like look different.. i like not crazy wen i look at him anymore.. ok-ok ar... maybe cuz now im really crazy bout my cousin.. nvm.. at one, we were dismissed. we went to religious tour. its ok ar... not bad... it would be more fun if we could go 2gether with the 3ea's.. haiz.. then we went home. 2molo i and amrita maybe going band.. hope there is no distraction.. cheow...

2day i very tired... my com got some fucking problem... irritating.. haiz.. 2day in schz nothing much happen ar.. no comments ar in school 2day.. after schx , hafizah, qayyum and me go ps watch shrek2... the movie good ar.. funny... i wanna watch harry potter... actually 2day many things happen but i dun wanna eleborate ar... scared later my internet go offline again... wont let it happen this tyme... k, bubye ppl...

woke up at 10 2day... yasterday watch cinta tiga musim until 3a.m sia... i still sleepy... juz now one piece gerek sey! they should make it 2 hours ar, 1 hour not enough. now i juz slack at home ar.. haiz.. so damn lazy 2 go schz 2molo ar! felt like not cuming... but dunno ar.. c 1st. 2molo got the bahas... lazy sia.. im still thinking of yasterday incident.. damn! i realli like him sia.. i die liao.. dunno wat to do.. haiz.. his smile was like pasted to my mind.. hehe.. k got to do the bahas script.. cheow..

2day i had band, phototaking.. the photographer siow ar, ppl playing the instrument he go and snap... sian ar.. i hope my pic wouldnt be shown... den we had footdrill... itz tiring but fun ar.. i went home at 11.30.my aunt fetched me as shez going to the hospital to visit her friend.. i was asked to sleep at either my uncle's place(where my handsome cousin,abg man is stayin) or my auntz place cuz my parentz went to kl and i would be alone at home... i choose to sleep at my auntyz place as i was shy to sleep at my cousinz place..but my aunt promise me to go over to my couzin's place as i already informed them im going over.. actually my main purpose was to see abg man and to see my uncle's baby.. i reach my cousin's place at 4.10..when i reach there, my bro was already there. he came back from ns 2day.. BUT MY COUSIN WAS NOT AT HOME!!! only my uncle, her wife, the baby and visitors.. i was like so upset... i ask my bro where is abg man n abg man's bro(firdaus) say he went fishing... ARGH!!! i was very close to my uncle's wife and we tok2.. the baby is sooo cute, den when i was rocking the baby to sleep, abg man and his other bro(aim or sumthing) came home.. i was like soooo excited!!! he salam my aunty and when he saw me, he smiled at me!!! haha! then we sit in the same room... dun get me wrong ar.. i mean, us wit my bro and my other cousins.. watch then play ps... i dunno why i suddenly bcame quiet when he came home.. whenever he look at my, i could juz smile... i was so happy!!! he kept on disturbing me about spintol.. laz tyme im a fan of Achik from spin(a malaysianz group) and he kept on disturbing me bout that.. i felt odd sia... b4 this whenever i met him i would alwayz tok to him but juz now i could juz smile... i think he realize that also and he was like alwayz turning back to me(not that im perasaan or wat lar, but i really saw him lookin at me...).. whn he saw me, i could juz smile... i dunno what else to do sia...he sat only a few inches away from me.. he sat beside me..my cousin, shi2 say that abg man once say that im cute... but laz tyme when she told me that i havent have the feelings 4 him yet and i like dun really care.. den when i wanna go back already, he sent us to the door.. at least i could say bye to him and he said bye back... AHAHA!!!! i think im really crazy bout him!!! ARGH!!! i wish more beautiful things would happen to us rather than juz smiles... hehehe.. i wanna watch pesta perdana ar... cheow.... tudluuuu.... im so happy 2day!!! im love sick!!! bubye.....

2day very straight forward.. ran 4 morning run... mr low caught alot of ppl walking, but he so merepek sia... alot of ppl hu get caught waz frm 3ea... physic i didnt hand in the hmwk.. i didnt cum ar dat day.. soon, i will oso owe hmwk to mrs tan... haiz.. malay period i and my group discuss abt the bahas.. 2day hidayah moliano cum.. my groupz end up nt producing aniting.. ah... ill do the scripts on sunday lar.. recess time hafizah and amrita say they saw I.S, but i didnt see him at all.. nvmlar.. maybe god wants me to 4get I.S.. i think im doing well without him..i dun tink im missing him, maybe cuz i had my attention on somebody else... hehe..my Amaths assignment increases to 13.. jz now kat wong gave us more assignments.. DAMN! im started 2 get worried abt it.. if she asked me to stay back one day and complete all my assignmentz, im doomed man.. sampai besok pn tak habiz... Juz now hafizah was frustrated with clara abt guides... even though i dun noe clara well, i find clara so merepek sey.. haha.. hafizah has the right to tell her off. 2molo band full u... need to find my uniform.. i dunno why juz now they cancelled band.. i miss band sia.. 2molo is the big day... im coming over my aunts place.. sooo nervous... i got butterflies in ma stomach juz by thinking of it... i scared i will screw up everything in front of my cousin 2molo... ARGH!!! maybe im watching shrek with hafizah and qayyum on monday.. hehe=] hm... i need to call my cousin, taufik, to ask him to accompany me go my aunty's place... =>see ya

2day was quite fun.. didnt run the 2.4km... haha! hack care ar.. jz run 1 round arnd the schx. den play gamez, badminton.. actually play 4 a while den slack arndz.. saw danial lestaluhu while sitting at the parade square..haiz.. after recess, malay.. got to do wat bahas n im wit syahmi, hafiz and amir.. actually nt bad ar, they quite funny.. i handed in all my fucking maths assignment.. im free now!! except the 11 Amaths assignment i owe kat wong.. art miss loo never cum.. sian ar.. I WAN MY ART RESULT! damn. i tink juz haf to wait for report book. Saturday got band photo taking.. wat the fuck muz find my band u. i dont noe where it is.. 2day im quite happy ar..dunno why.. eh i long time never see I.S... is he dead? ah...i dun care bout him anymore.. k ar.. gtg liao... =>tata

2day sux... haiz... dat kat wong scold me 4 not handing in ma maths assignment. i copy the fucking hmwk frm ppl in schx juz now n damn it 4get to hand in to her.. at least i only owe her 1 assignment now. yeh, i 4got i still owe her 12 Amaths assignment. Argh!!! dunno how im gonna complete all 12 assignment.. hack care lar. i slack sia.. still havent get my art marks yet.. highest 75. so low sia.. den later english period we go lab search abt dunno wat king tut or sumting.. haiz... den later assembly... sian ar. cannot sit wit hafizah in the hall. so damn fucking boring.. the assembly abt dunno wat tradisional malay instruments.. boring sia. juz now break saw danial lestaluhu.. haiz.. no comments ar.. can only sigh.. den extended... my teacher asked me to tuck in my shirt.. that one normal ar... dun really care. after extended.. stay back wit kat wong.. but it turns out well ar, cuz i now understand abit bt the Amaths..i go band 4 a few minutes to see wats going on, peiwen n jeinnie[dunno how to spell] got cum.. so happy to see peiwen... shez so cute sia.. haha.. eh i not lesbian ar, jz feel dat she makes a good section leader n shes so cute! i cant wait 4 harry potter to come out, 4th june.. n... 3 more days n i can see my handsome cousin!!! hahha!!! so excited.. dunno why everytime saw him not dat excited but now very excited.. eh i dunno wat im toking abt ar.. hehe.. k its 7+ already.. gtg.. cheow!!!='

i didnt go to schz 2day.. haha, eh i didnt ponteng ley, i got mc sia. my stomach got problem ar. guess wat i dreamt 2day??? ahhaha so merepek sia. i dreamt im at the airport, waitin 4 marshall[eminem]. its so damn funny. i asked 4 his autograph n we took pic 2gether. den we bcum frienz n he invitez me to U.S wit him.. haha i couldnt stop laughin when i wake up,laugh n laugh until ma stomach hurts. actually i already plan not to cum to schz yasterday.. luckily 2day ma stomach hurts so i got reason ar..haha. i didnt expect hafizah to be absent also.. cool.. but amrita poor ting, alone in schz. she shouldnt cum ar... eh i wan my art result lar!!! ish so irritating everyone knows their result i alone dun noe. ah... hu cares. damn man, i owe kat wong around 9 Amaths assignment and 4 Emaths assignment.. bloody hell!!! so lazy to do sia. dun understand aniting she teach. Amaths class i always sleep, slack arndz.. its a miracle i passed my Amaths exam.. Fiewh... no mood do my Amaths ar.. wish i could drop it but i noe ma mum wouldnt let me.. 2moro muz wear tie... haiya.. leceh ar but i like it. hehe... 2molo muz go band teach da juniors play their cornet.. wish peiwen cum.. but they busy wit o levelz ar.. nvm, got amrita surely fun sia.. hup 2molo a miracle happen 2 me.. haha. muz do maths ar.. cheow...

2day siaz sia.. ms loo neva cum.. canot get my art result, but i pass every other subject, though it wasnt good. at least, i pass my A maths n got A1 for my maths..juz now i saw danial lestaluhu at the bus stop...he obviously knows i "like" him.I THINK 'some ppl' also heard the rumours that i like danial lestaluhu..haiz..i dun like him lar.. i only admire his face,datz all.i marely said dat hes handsome, not dat i like him or sumting. i actually like my cousin.hez so handsome... Daniel lestaluhu is... juz dont get me wrong lar.now i only like 1 person, ma cousin..so ppl, plz.... jgn salah sangke eh.. i dun really like danial lestaluhu..orite, maybe laz time im confused but i obviously dont suit him sia.. hez only sec two.. Argh!!! i wish he knows i dun like him.. theres many cases whereby i admire sumone face by the streets, but dat doesnt mean i like dat guy!!!and my aunt invite me to stay over at her house diz saturday... so fun but im kind of nervous as my cousin would be there...cant wait.. ahaha!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

2day nothing happen lar. juz sit at home and laze arnd. dun feel like followin my mum to my auntz place. so, juz sit at hum, dream of my cousin... argh!!! my cousin[abg man] is so damn fucking handsome... hez 19 yrz old.i think i kind of like him. actually, i one month havent see him.kinD of miss him.he was very cloze wif my brother but since my brother was in ns,i havent seen him for a while.my brother came back from ns yasterday, and he went out for a while. i think he went to meet abg man.he is so handsome. but.... is'nt it awkward for me to like him,though my cousin,shi2 says its not wrong.should i like him or juz 4get it??? IM SO CONFUSED! shi2 says dat we does'nt suits each other as hez frm 369, but i find him very nice.. its so confusing...

2molo schling.. argh!! im not ready 4 school.. hmwks nt done.. i dunno watz gonna happen 2 me sia.. muz buck up man or else i wont succeed. i wanna make my late aunty be proud of me.. tot of teaching tuishan(dunno howta spell) im gonna teach malay n maths.. im teaching ma cousin.. but i kindof scared lah.. hehe.. well, abg man already go ns.. im surprised dat i dun miss him... ahh... well maybe dat tyme im juz confused.. i think i juz like him cauze i wan to 4get I.S... datz all.. well, hez nt as handsome as khalis.. perangai pn burok... im relieve dat i dont reallie fall 4 him.. if not... dunno lar watz gonna happen 2 me..i hope wen sch reopens n i saw I.S, i wont have any feelings 4 him cause now i reallie have to buck up.. no tyme 4 all this.. studies are damn important.. my eyes nearly ok already.. lucky ar.. if nt i go to sch wif my eyes swollen.. eh 7+ already ar.. gtg... duhh......

yo.. i noe lah i long time never update already... haha.. im a buzy lady.. anyway, 2day tired sia.. i go swimming.. 2day so unexpected.. i saw Khalis at the jurong swimming complex.. 1st wen i saw him, aku stan at the wall at the lazy river, then i slip.. that was wen i saw him.. i was like shock 2 see him sia.. my mouth was like tenganga.. he wore black swimming trunks.. wen i look at him, my expression was so damn burok! ah!!! well he also look at me some kind.. dunno lah whether he recognize me onot.. 3 yrs sey never mit him.. hm.. i reallie regret not saying hi to him.. at least if say hi mayb can exchange no.. at least i can keep in contact wif an old friend..Damn! ahh.. nvm lah.. not fated man.. k lah.. penat belom hilang.. cheaow..

haiz... 2day tired sia... nowdays always sleep later then 12... tok to him.. hehe.. hes actuallie soooo sweet ar... i still cant believe hes my ehem.. wellll... haiz.. its 07/97/2004... nice date.. hmmm... i juz love my baby cousin!!! hez so cute.. he kols me kakak dat tyme.. im so happy!!! well my hair is a disaster sia... actually ok lah.. ahhh i oso dunno i owe mrs wong more den 15 amaths assignments and arnd 5 maths assignments.. wanna die liow.. lucky she never catch me with my hair n stuff.. mr rafi also nowadays like to look at our group, hafizah say maybe hez targeting on us lah... wah 2day my hair funny sia... its like i also dunno how 2 describe liow.. wellll... i wanna sleep 4 awhile lah.. cheaow! *sumbodys name is md fazly fareez bin sinusi... hahaha... like his name sia.. nice.. k... tudluu... #muackz#

haiz... 2day my stomach hurts again.. my stomach always give me problems sia. haiz... my hair was a disaster... haiz... my stomach... felt like checking my stomach, x-ray or sumthing.. wat if i got appendix??? haiz... its better to be safe then sorry wat.. but my mum say its normal.. where got normal if always pain like hell sia. juz now mrs khoo called me..sian ar... my stomach still hurts ar... yeah i need 2 ask my mum to sign the test... i fail.. 5/25... argh!!! watever lah.. cheow... got a maths song to share.... i dun wanna study maths in my lifetyme i feel like my head can burst out if i can see one everywhere i go i see maths in my pathline i never ever solve a sum im my damn mind life would be doomed if i dun score maths an A1 life would be dull if i learn maths i be no fun jump up and down and i noe my work is not done i hate maths! i hate them! yo i hate... duhh.. (this is juz the chorus.. very lazy to include the whole song that is with rap...)
